short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically extract phone numbers from any website and export them to CSV with ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Powerful Extension To Extract Phone Numbers Automatically From Any Web Pages.

Find phone numbers in seconds.

Phone Number Extractor is a powerful phone number extraction extension for Chrome. The extension automatically fetches and validates phone numbers from any web page. You can then copy or export them all to a CSV file for your own use.

The extension directly go through the source code of the web page and does not rely on what you actually see.

Each of the tabs that you navigate too will automatically have the phone numbers extracted. All phone numbers are temporarily stored in your local storage, allowing you to access them as long as the corresponding tab is opened.

As there are many phone number format for every countries, although the extension has been throughly tested, if you encounter any kind of bugs, please contact me by email.

Disclaimer : This extension is not developed with an intention to spam people cold calls and the likes, but instead for personal use.
